author: Ramnan Ramyil
text: Guess who's trying skincare now. Now I'm standing in front of the mirror at night, tapping some kind of serum on my face.

author: Sofia Abubakar
text: Just sent my boo a hefty valentine's package. You already know I'm the package sending final boss lol.
